info.title: IF2LEVA3 - Preview
info.description: performis IF2LEVA3 | Interface for leva+ base, scheduling and workshop

get.description: search interface for maschine master data

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: Optional search string for looking up a record within name and searchterm fields.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: changesSinceDateTime
parameters.description: Get all the entites which were added/edited since a specific datetime. Cannot be used together with search parameter (ID, Searchstring).

parameters.name: changesSinceChangeID
parameters.description: Get all the entities which were added/edited since the provided ChangeID. Cannot be used together with search parameter (ID, Searchstring).

parameters.name: internalID
parameters.description: Retrieve specific record by internal id. (Ignores other search options if provided)

parameters.name: externalID
parameters.description: Retrieve specific record by external id. (Ignores searchString parameter if provided)

parameters.name: X-RequestingSystem
parameters.description: Identifing the system calling the service.

parameters.name: X-RequestingUser
parameters.description: Identifing the user calling the service.

parameters.name: X-Flow-ID
parameters.description: (Optional) Technical ID (GUID) for Call identification
